content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_slab
inventory=[{"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 19}, {"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "acacia_door", "quantity": 38, "index": 32}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 31, "index": 36}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft oak_slab. Oak_slab requires placing 1 oak_planks in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the oak_planks from slot 19 into the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_slab
inventory=[{"type": "oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "acacia_door", "quantity": 38, "index": 32}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 31, "index": 36}]

thought: Since the oak_planks has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the oak_planks to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the oak_planks to slot 2.
act: move from slot 19 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_slab
inventory=[{"type": "oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "acacia_door", "quantity": 38, "index": 32}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 31, "index": 36}]

thought: Since the oak_planks has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the oak_planks to the right of it. Slot 3 is to the right of slot 2, and therefore I will move the oak_planks to slot 3.
act: move from slot 19 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_slab
inventory=[{"type": "oak_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "acacia_door", "quantity": 38, "index": 32}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 31, "index": 36}]
thought: Now I can craft the oak_slab by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
